nodes.text: Media are the channels and tools used for storing and transmitting information.

Many media, such as the HoloNet, relied on hologram technology. This was referred to as the holomedia. The New Republic textfile "Why Do We Fight the Empire?" was released to the holomedia in the weeks following the Galactic Empire's siege of Caprioril.
The "gossip media" were the sources of information on celebrities and public figures. Lady Alya Aldrete was heavily watched by the gossip media.
